title: I Favor the Villainess - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Mystery   Romance   School Life   Sci-fi   Shoujo Ai
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manga   Adapted to Visual Novel   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Clever Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Different Social Status   European Ambience   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Incest   Kingdoms   Love Rivals   Magic   Maids   Marriage   Modern Knowledge   Monsters   Nobles   Otome Game   Politics   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Reincarnated in a Game World   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Tsundere   Unconditional Love   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Inori.   いのり。
description:
“I am the heroine of an otome game, so is it wrong to like the villainess?”

Corporate s*ave OL, Oohashi Rei, reincarnated as the heroine Rei Taylor in the world of the otome game 「Revolution」.

Her preference isn’t the capturable princes, it’s the villainess, Claire François.

She merrily accepts Claire’s dislike.

With the protagonist’s involvement, it’s the beginning of a unique romcom.

To make it worse, Rei’s love became directed at the villainess, what does Claire’s future hold?

It’s my second series with a screwball villainess.

A little different from ordinary… I hope you can enjoy the villainess who’s just a little different.>
